scripts.clean: rm -f dist/css/* && rm -f dist/js/* && rm -f dist/images/*
scripts.build-dev:css: npm run autoprefixer-dev && npm run cssnano-dev
scripts.build-prod:css: npm run autoprefixer-prod && npm run cssnano-prod
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-dev:css && npm run build-dev:js && npm run imagemin
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prod:css && npm run imagemin
